remarks: A Hilbert lattice has the superposition property.  Theorem 13.2 in [Crawley] p. 107.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jan-2012.)
statement:
hlsupr.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
hlsupr.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlsupr.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlsupr $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> E. r e. A ( r =/= P /\ r =/= Q /\ r .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) $.
$d A r $.
$d K r $.
$d P r $.
$d Q r $.
